title: Analysis from graph of f' part - d

content.description:
Note: This is the graph of the derivative of f, not the graph of f.

The figure above shows the graph of f ′ , the derivative of a function f. The domain of f is the set of all real numbers x such that−3 <x <5 .
content.question: Suppose that f(1)=0 . In the xy-plane provided, draw a sketch that shows the general shape of the graph of the function f on the open interval 0<x<2 .

frqParts.text: Suppose that f(1)=0 . In the xy-plane provided, draw a sketch that shows the general shape of the graph of the function f on the open interval 0<x<2 .

topic.text: 5.8: Sketching Graphs of Functions and Their Derivatives

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Identify how mathematical characteristics or properties of functions are related in different representations.
